pullrequest.title: Added spherical coordinates to the GUI

content.raw:
I tried inserting a model, selecting it, then clicking on spherical coordinates, but the fields appear 0?

Should the `Spherical Coordinates` be an item on its own?. Maybe we can place it in `Models` below the `pose` field?
content.html:
I tried inserting a model, selecting it, then clicking on spherical coordinates, but the fields appear 0?

Should the Spherical Coordinates be an item on its own?. Maybe we can place it in Models below the pose field?
